Rod (Arcane, Druidic, or Holy Focus), (attunement optional)

A sleek silver rod adorned with an ornament depicting a scorpion locked in combat with a golop. While holding this focus, you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls.

While attuned

While you have it somewhere on your person, you gain a +1 bonus to the save DCs of spells you cast. The rod has a maximum of 7 charges. As a minor action, you can touch the rod to a creature and spend up to 3 charges to heal it for 1d4+1 hit points per charge spent. The rod regains 1 charge each time you cause a hostile creature to become @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.9X088PM7H5U2S1HQ]{Sickened}, @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.SRRBLPRSJWGUR551]{Poisoned}, or @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.9YPWLY1IHQV3MRLO]{Diseased}.
